title: Pathways to Impact Award: Cardiff University
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The funding was used to support patent applications through exemplification of the baseline discovery made in epsrc funded research Chemicals,Energy,Environment Economic
findingsText: This was a grant to Cardiff University that was used to stimulate the commercialisation of epsrc funded research New processes have been facilitated Chemicals,Energy,Environment
